Token.Abstract: A location filter factory provides {@link ILPFilter filters} that operate on {@link ILPLocation locations}.
Returns a filter that accepts all locations.

ReturnValue.Abstract: a filter that accepts all locations

Token.Abstract: Returns a filter that accepts only those locations for which check-in has been enabled.

ReturnValue.Abstract: a filter that accepts only those locations for which check-in has been enabled

Token.Abstract: Returns a filter that accepts only those locations with the given tag.

Parameter.Name: tag
Parameter.Abstract: The tag that must be present on the locations accepted by the returned filter

ReturnValue.Abstract: a filter that accepts only those locations with the given tag @throws IllegalArgumentException if the given tag is nil

Token.Abstract: Returns a filter that accepts only those locations that are within the given distance from the last known geopoint of the device.

Parameter.Name: distance
Parameter.Abstract: The distance, in meters, that describes the maximum distance a location can be from the last known geopoint and still be accepted by the returned filter

ReturnValue.Abstract: a filter that accepts only those locations that are within the given distance from the last known geopoint of the device

Token.Abstract: Returns a filter that accepts only those locations that the device is currently in according to the Localpoint server.

ReturnValue.Abstract: a filter that accepts only those locations that the device is currently in according to the Localpoint server.
